hero.title: Ruaa Beauty
hero.subtitle: Where Elegance Meets Craftsmanship
hero.description: We offer premium lash extensions, lash lifts, brow lifts, professional makeup, facial threading, and stunning Mehendi (Henna) designs. Whether it's for a wedding, a celebration, or any special occasion ‚Äî in our studio or in the comfort of your home ‚Äî all the beauty you need is right here in one place.

bookingForm.title: Reserve Your Appointment
bookingForm.priceLashLift: Natural lift, curl, and defined lashes
bookingForm.lashLiftDescription: A technique that lifts the natural lashes from the root to give a defined curl and a beautiful look without extensions.
bookingForm.lashLiftHow: How it's done: The lashes are softened with special steps to make lifting easier, then shaped and fixed to create a natural and long-lasting curl.
bookingForm.lashLiftResult: Result: Longer, lifted, curled lashes lasting 6‚Äì8 weeks.
bookingForm.priceBrowLift: Perfectly shaped, lifted, and defined brows
bookingForm.priceBridalMakeup: Bridal makeup for your special day, elegant and radiant
bookingForm.priceMehendi: Intricate, unique, and beautiful henna designs
bookingForm.priceThreading: Precise, gentle, and professional facial threading

mehendi.heroTitle: Exquisite Mehendi Designs for Every Occasion
mehendi.heroDescription: Celebrate your special moments with our intricate Mehendi artistry. From weddings and engagements to festive gatherings, we create stunning hand and arm designs that are as unique as you. Beautiful, detailed, and crafted with love.
